## Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

## Load penguin data
```{r}
penguins_filepath <- here("data", "penguins.csv")
penguins <- read_csv(penguins_filepath)
glimpse(penguins)
penguins <- penguins |> drop_na()
```

## Load iris data
```{r}
iris_filepath <- here("data", "iris.csv")

glimpse(iris)
```
